org.noname.wrapper

Class Poloniex.Public

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.noname.wrapper.Poloniex.Public
  • Enclosing class:
    Poloniex

    public static class Poloniex.Public
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for Poloniex public API. According to Poloniex API documentation, there are six public methods, all of which take HTTP GET requests and return output in JSON format

      • volume

        public static org.noname.wrapper.VolumeData volume()
        Returns:
        24-hour volume for all markets, plus totals for primary currencies

      • orderBook

        public static org.noname.wrapper.OrderBookData orderBook(java.lang.String currencyPair)
        Parameters:
        currencyPair - Pair of cryptocurrencies (e.g. BTC_ETH)
        Returns:
        Order book for a given market, as well as a sequence number for use with the Push API and an indicator specifying whether the market is frozen

      • orderBookAll

        public static org.noname.wrapper.OrderBookData[] orderBookAll()
        Returns:
        Order book for all markets, as well as a sequence number for use with the Push API and an indicator specifying whether the market is frozen

      • tradeHistory

        public static org.noname.wrapper.TradeData[] tradeHistory(java.lang.String currencyPair)
        Parameters:
        currencyPair - Pair of cryptocurrencies (e.g. BTC_ETH)
        Returns:
        Past 200 trades for a given market

      • tradeHistory

        public static org.noname.wrapper.TradeData[] tradeHistory(long unixStartDate,
                                                          long unixEndDate,
                                                          java.lang.String currencyPair)
        Parameters:
        unixStartDate - Start date in UNIX timestamp
        unixEndDate - End date in UNIX timestamp
        currencyPair - Pair of cryptocurrencies (e.g. BTC_ETH)
        Returns:
        Past trades for a given market, up to 50,000 trades in a range specified in UNIX timestamps

      • chartData

        public static org.noname.wrapper.ChartData[] chartData(long unixStartDate,
                                                       long unixEndDate,
                                                       java.lang.String currencyPair,
                                                       int period)
        Parameters:
        unixStartDate - Start date in UNIX timestamp
        unixEndDate - End date in UNIX timestamp
        currencyPair - Pair of cryptocurrencies (e.g. BTC_ETH)
        period - Candlestick period in seconds; valid values are 300, 900, 1800, 7200, 14400, and 86400
        Returns:
        Candlestick chart data for the specified date range for the data returned in UNIX timestamps

      • currencies

        public static org.noname.wrapper.CurrencyData[] currencies()
        Returns:
        Information on all currencies

      • loanOrders

        public static org.noname.wrapper.LoanOrderData loanOrders(java.lang.String currency)
        Parameters:
        currency - Cryptocurrency name in symbol (e.g. BTC)
        Returns:
        List of loan offers and demands for a given currency
